techmeme.title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang says he was "disappointed" after a report that China has urged Chinese companies not to use the company's AI chips (Ryan Browne/CNBC)
iPhone 17 review: best value of the 17 lineup with a 120Hz refresh rate screen, good A19 performance, and Center Stage front camera but no telephoto lens (Eric Zeman/PCMag)
iPhone 17 Pro review: has a solid battery life, brighter screen outdoors, and doesn't get hot but it's heavier than usual and Siri needs to catch up with rivals (The Verge)
iPhone Air review: remarkably light and pleasant to use for long periods of time but no ultrawide camera and battery drains quicker than a standard phone (Allison Johnson/The Verge)
EvoluteIQ, which offers a low-code AI platform for companies to design, deploy, and scale business processes, raised $53M led by Baird Capital (Tamara Djurickovic/Tech.eu)
